meaning_str.bing:
n. 家伙；同事；男人；同辈
adj. 同类的；同事的；同伴的；同情况的
网络. 伙伴；会员；院士

同类的；同事的；同伴的；同情况的

伙伴；家伙；同伴；同事；同辈；同行；同类；对等物；（如学院或专业团体的）会员；研究员；奖学金获得者；（某些学院或大学的）董事；男性朋友；男子；男孩；小伙子
同伴的；同事的；同行的；同类的；同道的；志趣相投的；相似的；共事的；同情况的

1.en: Muslim comedians do not just ridicule their fellow citizens' foibles. Satire bubbles up in even the most repressive regimes.
1.cn: 穆斯林喜剧演员不只是吐槽平民的小毛病。即使在镇压最残酷的政权里讽刺作品也有所涌现。

2.en: Wang's zeal is contagious; soon all his fellow students were busily making posters, inspired by his ardent enthusiasm for the cause.
2.cn: 王的热情传染般蔓延开来，一会儿他的同学都为他燃烧般的激情所触动而在忙着做海报标语了。

3.en: He was an international affairs fellow at the Council on Foreign Relations and a visiting scholar at the International Monetary Fund (IMF).
3.cn: 曾任外交关系委员会（CouncilonForeignRelations）国际事务研究员，及国际货币基金组织访问学者。

0.en: We're ready. You can go in now. Surprise. For she's a jolly good fellow, For she's a jolly good fellow, For she's a jolly good fellow, And so say all of us. Hooray.
0.cn: 我们准备好了。你现在可以进去了。惊喜！因为她是个快乐的好人，因为她是个快乐的好人，因为她是个快乐的好人，我们所有人都这样说。太棒了！

1.en: From a fellow space traveler. It's a true honor. The honor is mine.
1.cn: 作为后进的宇宙旅行者，见到你很荣幸。我也很荣幸。

2.en: Like that young fellow out there named Vector. He just stole a pyramid!
2.cn: 就像门外那个叫“向量”的年轻人，金字塔就是他偷的！

3.en: Is this the fellow who peed in your Hawaiian Punch? No, that was a different guy.
3.cn: 这就是那个往你的夏威夷潘趣饮料里撒尿的家伙吗？不是，那是另外一个。

4.en: Hey thanks. Scott Alexander, Joey Tribbianni. Joey is a fellow processor. No kidding.
4.cn: 谢了，史考，这是乔伊，乔伊他也是一个处理员。真的？

5.en: You are a fellow. I make the decisions here. Well, I own this hospital. You work for me.
5.cn: 你是研究员，这里我说了算。我是医院的股东，你给我打工呢。

6.en: Well, speaking as a fellow second son, I have grown rather used to being the family insult.
6.cn: 同样作为次子，我已经习惯了成为家族耻辱。

7.en: How old are you, Mr. Turing? 27. And how old were you when you became a Fellow at Cambridge? 24.
7.cn: 你多大了，图灵先生？呃，二十七岁。你在剑桥上学的时候多大？二十四岁。

8.en: Ted and his fellow California tomato growers produce close to 13 million tons of them every year.
8.cn: 泰德和其他的加州番茄种植者每年能收获将近一千三百万吨番茄。

9.en: Blood it ran down through this fellow's face and eyes. It was when that he go in and called for medic.
9.cn: 血顺着这家伙的脸跟眼流下，那是当他开始呼喊军医的时候。

10.en: Thank you so much. Thank you. Mr. Speaker, Mr. Vice President, members of Congress, my fellow Americans.
10.cn: 非常感谢。谢谢，议长先生，副总统先生。各位国会议员，我的美国同胞们。

11.en: And when this 13-year old man was asked about his fellow amputees, he said this: First, they will be sad.
11.cn: 当问到这位13岁的小伙子对其他截肢患者们的想法时，他说道 “起初，他们会感到悲痛。”

12.en: Well, my fellow Americans, before this year is out, we will put a Wolowitz on one of America's top models.
12.cn: 我亲爱的美国兄弟们，不出今年我们就可以把沃罗威茨送到一个超级模特身边去。

13.en: Oh, by the way, a fellow at work said I could use his Dodger tickets this weekend. Does that sound like fun?
13.cn: 对了，我一个同事说要给我周末道奇队比赛的门票，应该很好玩吧？

14.en: Oh. You know, I have always been intrigued by flip-flops. The official footwear of the laid-back fellow. Okay, sure.
14.cn: 我倒是一直对人字拖感到好奇。悠闲之人的标配鞋。你高兴就好。

15.en: I read recently about a fellow in Kansas with an enormous ball of twine. I bet you could give him a run for his money.
15.cn: 我最近得知堪萨斯州一个家伙拿麻绳团了一个巨大的球，我认为你可以跟他一比高下。

16.en: Describing how you came to be on school property after hours, using alcohol and drugs, where a fellow student almost died.
16.cn: 描述一下，为什么放学之后你们会在学校喝酒，吸大麻，还差点害死一个学生。

17.en: My fellow Americans, we know how to do this. We've done it before. It's the way we used to do business and we can do it that way again.
17.cn: 亲爱的同胞们，我们都知道如何做到这些。我们以前曾做到过。这是我们曾经走过的路，让我们再走一遍。

18.en: Yes, that's right. And, so far, each of your fellow defendants has specifically denied being part of that process. Now, I'm going to ask you.
18.cn: 对，没错。到现在为止，其他几位被告都否认自己曾参与这一过程。现在，我要问你。

19.en: Of course he's got a name. He's mine. I bought him off an Irishman fellow I met at a pub last year. I lent him to Dumbledore to guard the...Yes?
19.cn: 当然有名字，他是我的是我去年在酒馆向一个爱尔兰人买的，后来借给邓布利多去看守...什么？
